QuestData.Title: The Others
QuestData.Description: There are yet a few survivors. I saw them pile onto Arbiter Khan during the fighting.$B$BMore importantly, I can hear little Isel's sobs. She's nearby. I hope her mother is still alive.$B$BYour dwarf friend, Hansel, came in to try to rescue us. He thought he could take the Warsong on his own. I'm afraid I don't know what happened to him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue Arbiter Khan, Caregiver Felaani & Isel, and Hansel Heavyhands.
QuestData.RewardText: Khan! No!... he just received his promotion. His whole life ahead of him and now, nothing.$B$BThank you for getting the others out. Light be... nevermind.
